id: {Player} was always eager to help around the village

onSuccess.displayText:
{Player} learned to harvest crops, mend roofs, and tend to the wounded. He often joined the villagers on hunts through the forest. From time to time, travelers came to {VillageName}, including merchants, wandering knights, and skilled hunters. They shared stories of the wider world and taught him their skills. With their guidance, {Player} learned to wield a sword and draw a bow, adding martial skill to his growing knowledge.

One afternoon, while practicing with his sword in a quiet corner of the forest, {Player} noticed {VillageGirl}, a young villager girl, watching him with wide eyes. Before either of them could speak, a massive, enraged wild boar charged from the brush toward her. In one swift motion, {Player} swung his sword and struck the boar down, saving {VillageGirl}. A fleeting event that left a lasting impression on {Player}.
choices: {Player} decides to head to the nearest town
